name: Robot Destroyer
description:
this is my second game but first upload in itch.io 

made for windows

made on topic blink

in this blink is the ability to dash

controls

  1. to move use WASD keys
  2. space bar to jump
  3. left click to shoot
  4. right click to dash forward
  5. scroll wheel / 1,2 keys to switch weapons
  6. move the mouse to look around
  7. alt + f4 to close
  8. you need to destroy the enemy drones
  9. they have 100 hp
  10. pistol does 20 damage
  11. pistol has 5 bullets and does 100 damage per magazine
  12. rifle does 5 damage
  13. rile has 10 bullets and does 50 damage per magazine 
  14. player has 100 hp
  15. enemy does 5 damage 
  16. when you loose all your life your weapons are destroyed

have fun playing
